about_the_game:
In Fear Academy, puzzle-solving is woven into the fabric of your unsettling journey through Hillcrest High. As you navigate the darkened halls, a constant sense of being watched keeps you on edge, making even the simplest tasks feel daunting. Each puzzle challenges you to think clearly in an environment filled with tension, where every shadow and distant noise could hide something sinister. You'll solve puzzles not just to advance, but to survive—always questioning what might be lurking around the next corner as you attempt to stay one step ahead of the ancient evil that has claimed the school.

The possessed janitor, Mr. Thompson, stalks the eerie, dimly lit hallways of Hillcrest High. His every step echoes through the spooky corridors, sending shivers down your spine. Only carefully planned routes and skillful maneuvering will keep you from being spotted. Stay alert, move quietly, and think quickly—your safety depends on it.

Interact with a fully immersive environment where every object tells a story. Pick up, examine, and manipulate items to uncover their significance, move objects to change the space around you, and engage with the world in a way that draws you deeper into the unsettling atmosphere.

content_descriptors.notes: Fear Academy includes some violence to enhance the fear and tension, fitting the genre's dark atmosphere. While there are graphic elements, they’re used purposefully to build suspense and are not excessive.
